oai_dc:dc.dc:title: FERRY WAVE MEASUREMENTS IN DEEP WATER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nece, Ronald E.
McCaslin, Michael R.
Christensen, Derald R.
Yeh, Harry H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: deep water
ferry wave
wave measurements
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Data are presented for ship waves generated and measured in deep water. Results show the variation of maximum vessel waves with both vessel speed and distance from the vessel sailing line. Three automobile ferries of different configurations were tested. Field test procedures, limitations, and problems are described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 20 (1986): Proceedings of 20th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Taipei, Taiwan, 1986.; 46
